Description
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial
Contains inertial entities.

Contains classes to perform calibration of accelerometers, gyroscopes and magnetometers.

    Subclasses of InertialException in com.irurueta.navigation.inertial

    Class
    Description
    class 
    INSException
    Exception related to INS estimation when attempting to estimate position, velocity and attitude using inertial data.
    class 
    INSGNSSException
    Exception related to INS/GNSS estimation when attempting to estimate position, velocity and attitude using both satellite and inertial data.
